title: XOR from l to r
statement: You are given two integers l and r (1 <= l <= r < 10^18). Your task is to compute the XOR of all integers from l to r, i.e., l ⊕ (l+1) ⊕ ... ⊕ r.
input_format: The first and only line contains two integers l and r.
output_format: Print a single integer — the result of XOR of all numbers from l to r.
